zpa_ba_certificate¶

The zpa_ba_certificate data source provides details about a specific browser access certificate created in the Zscaler Private Access cloud. This data source is required when creating a browser access resource.

Example Usage¶

# ZPA Browser Access Data Source
data "zpa_ba_certificate" "foo" {
  name = "example.acme.com"
}

Argument Reference¶

The following arguments are supported:

  • name - (Required) Name. The name of the browser access certificate to be exported.

Attribute Reference¶

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

  • cert_chain (String)

  • cname (String)

  • creation_time (Number)

  • description (String)

  • issued_by (String)

  • issued_to (String)

  • modified_time (Number)

  • modifiedby (Number)

  • name (String)

  • san (List of String)

  • serial_no (String)

  • status (String)

  • valid_from_in_epochsec (Number)

  • valid_to_in_epochsec (Number)

:warning: Notice that certificate and public_keys are omitted from the output.
